text: His Name Is Sukhe-Bator () is a 1942 Soviet drama movie directed by Iosif Kheifits and Aleksandr Zarkhi.Биография Александра ЗархиЕго зовут Сухэ-Батор (1942) The movie tells about the founder of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party, the leader of the Mongolian People's Revolution - Damdin Sukhe-Bator. It stars Nikolay Cherkasov, Semyon Goldshtab, and Maksim Shtraukh. ==Actors== * Nikolay Cherkasov as Baron Ungern * Semyon Goldshtab as Josef Stalin * Maksim Shtraukh as V.I. Lenin * Lev Sverdlin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1942 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Iosif Kheifits Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Zarkhi Category:Soviet drama movies
title: His Name Is Sukhe-Bator
